name: Hungry Hands
description:
This game was created within the "Summer Lab 2014", a workshop by the educational institute Image Campus (http://www.imagecampus.edu.ar) whose goal was to develop and publish a simple but complete videogame in a month using resources from the institute.

The game was created by students from the different careers and courses offered by the institute (Game Design, Videogame Development, 3D Modelling and Animation, Game Art, etc.) and they were guided and assisted by some of the professors teaching those courses.
